title: Anivia Wall starting too large [GAMEPLAY]
body: Anivia's "crystalize" is on skins using classic spell effects (everything besides blackfrost) are starting with the wall being too large for the rank 1 spell, this bug occurs just by leveling up your skill as normal and pressing w. It's not a horrible bug however it is unfair when you have the jungler trying to gank early and they can be completely walled from ganking by a rank one skill when it usually doesn't even block the side river paths completely.

replies.body:
Hey ubiquitousdragon! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix! ^-^
